author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two men were killed in separate road accidents at the same spot on the Cuddalore road.

Police said while Sambasivam (63), construction worker was crossing the road near Thavalakuppam, tanker lorry hit him. Passers-by took him to Government hospital where he succumbed to injuries. At the same spot, a car belonging to a private hospital hit a 60-year-old person while he was crossing.
title: Two die in accidents
